title: Amazon sends Mastercard, Google Play gift card order emails by mistake
description: Amazon mistakenly sent out purchase confirmation emails for Hotels.com, Google Play, and Mastercard gift cards to customers, making many worried their accounts were compromised. [...]

title: Meet LostTrust ransomware — A likely rebrand of the MetaEncryptor gang
description: The LostTrust ransomware operation is believed to be a rebrand of MetaEncryptor, utilizing almost identical data leak sites and encryptors. [...]

title: New Marvin attack revives 25-year-old decryption flaw in RSA
description: A flaw related to the PKCS #1 v1.5 padding in SSL servers discovered in 1998 and believed to have been resolved still impacts several widely-used projects today. [...]
